channel.title: 中文 on Redamancy - We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
channel.description: Recent content in 中文 on Redamancy - We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.

item.title: [诗词] 《春江花月夜》
item.description: 《春江花月夜》是唐代诗人张若虚的诗作。此诗沿用陈隋乐府旧题，运用富有生活气息的清丽之笔，以月为主体，以江为场景，描绘了一幅幽美邈远、惝恍迷离
